52177.<voice 00570_00052177><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00570_00052177><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>Are you... a traveler?<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52178.<voice 00660_00052178><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00660_00052178><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>I am King Bermud.
<auto_br=2500>
I am honored that a traveler
such as yourself would cross the desert to
come to my kingdom.<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52179.<voice 00690_00052179><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00690_00052179><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>By the way, if you'd indulge me...
did you notice anything unusual with the
citizens before coming here to me?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52180.<voice 00760_00052180><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00760_00052180><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>To tell the truth,
our citizens have no memory of their names,
even their entire past...
<auto_br=2500>
All because of a recent war that occurred.<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52181.<voice 00800_00052181><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00800_00052181><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>This country is in turmoil, and everyone
has lost their hope. At wits' end,
I prayed to the heavens for guidance.<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52182.<voice 00845_00052182><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00845_00052182><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>That was when I received a revelation...
To give a name and a purpose to each
citizen and to lead them to a just future.<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52183.<voice 00900_00052183><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00900_00052183><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>Therefore, this country is slowly but
surely recovering itself.
<auto_br=2500>
If my people are acting strange,
please forgive me.<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 01860_00052289><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Yeah! Starting today, you're Clawde!

52292.<voice 02160_00052292><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02160_00052292><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>It is true that monsters will

52293.<voice 02190_00052293><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02190_00052293><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>There are also kind monsters like this who
we can bond with. Even the ones that have

52294.<voice 02310_00052294><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02310_00052294><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Yeah! If we tell everyone about those
Monster Masters, maybe they'll understand

52295.<voice 02375_00052295><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02375_00052295><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>I know this might be scary, Clawde...
But will you please come with me to
Arahaghiro?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52297.<voice 02490_00052297><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02490_00052297><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Good! Let's all go back to

29000536.<voice 00229_29000536><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00229_29000536><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Clawde, wait for me around here!
If I take you inside,
everyone in town will be frightened.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52300.<voice 00264_00052300><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00264_00052300><start_lip_sync n02039 _normal m00001>Ey'! Ya hear that?<stop_lip_animation n02039 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52301.<voice 00329_00052301><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00329_00052301><start_lip_sync n02039 _normal m00001>They're holdin' a huge event at the

52304.<voice 00449_00052304><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00449_00052304><start_lip_sync n02041 _normal m00001>That sounds amazing! Bermud really knows

fight until just one's left standing! <heart><stop_lip_animation n02041 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52305.<voice 00489_00052305><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00489_00052305><start_lip_sync n02040 _normal m00001>They're really gonna fight to the death...
Whew! I got chills just thinking about it!
This is gonna be the best event ever!<stop_lip_animation n02040 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52306.<voice 00549_00052306><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00549_00052306><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Did you hear what they just said...?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00594_00052307><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>How horrible!

52308.<voice 00634_00052308><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00634_00052308><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>We have to do something about this stupid

29000823.<voice 00704_29000823><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00704_29000823><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>That's it... I've got an idea!

52310.<voice 00744_00052310><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00744_00052310><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Monsters in the arena are taken into the
underground cage via the service entrance

29000537.<voice 00774_29000537><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00774_29000537><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>For now, should we go to the side entrance?

<voice 00814_29000538><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>You can't get to the monsters-only service

29000539.<voice 00100_29000539><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00100_29000539><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001><pc>, please wait!

29000540.<voice 00290_29000540><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00290_29000540><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Sorry to keep you waiting...

52315.<voice 00380_00052315><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00380_00052315><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>There are stairs leading to the arena's
basement. Once there, go right and there
are a bunch of cells holding the monsters.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52316.<voice 00440_00052316><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00440_00052316><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>That's weird... it's my first time here,
so why do I already know all this stuff?
Well, never mind...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52317.<voice 00500_00052317><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00500_00052317><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Anyways, there's a soldier standing guard

52318.<voice 00540_00052318><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00540_00052318><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Show Clawde to the soldier and say you

52319.<voice 00580_00052319><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00580_00052319><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>The king is suspicious of me, and the

52320.<voice 00610_00052320><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00610_00052320><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>When you get to the cells,
leave the rest to me.

52321.<voice 00650_00052321><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00650_00052321><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Until then, Clawde and I will follow

53283.<voice 00335_00053283><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00335_00053283><start_lip_sync n02043 _normal m00001>Hmm? What's with that Great Sabrecat?<stop_lip_animation n02043 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00465_00052323><start_lip_sync n02044 _normal m00001>What?!

52324.<voice 00540_00052324><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00540_00052324><start_lip_sync n02043 _normal m00001>All right, I'll take you to the cells.

52329.<voice 01980_00052329><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01980_00052329><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>I'll just borrow your key for a second.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52330.<voice 02250_00052330><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02250_00052330><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>I'm letting you all free!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52331.<voice 02350_00052331><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02350_00052331><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Umm... here we go!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 02550_00052332><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>You don't have to stay here anymore.

52340.<voice 03655_00052340><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03655_00052340><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>What... was that?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52342.<voice 03935_00052342><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03935_00052342><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Back then... When they went to war.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 04355_00052345><start_lip_sync n02045 _normal m00001>If you don't cooperate, then I shall have

52346.<voice 04465_00052346><start_lip_sync n0:

52347.<voice 04960_00052347><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 04960_00052347><start_lip_sync n02236 _normal m00001>I'm sorry, everyone...<stop_lip_animation n02236 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 05435_00052350><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001><pc>... I just remembered something.

52357.<voice 00650_00052357><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00650_00052357><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Stop doing that!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52358.<voice 00825_00052358><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00825_00052358><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>You are Bermud,

52359.<voice 00925_00052359><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00925_00052359><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>The great Monster Master shown on that

52360.<voice 01025_00052360><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01025_00052360><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>I remember you... And I remember who I am.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52361.<voice 01140_00052361><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01140_00052361><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>How could you, who loved the monsters

52362.<voice 01310_00052362><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01310_00052362><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>They deserve to die...<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52363.<voice 01380_00052363><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01380_00052363><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>They are the vile, sinful bastards who

52364.<voice 01450_00052364><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01450_00052364><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>War shield? But that's...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52389.<voice 02930_00052389><start_lip_sync m5: <voice 02930_00052389><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>That's enough, Seraphi... Don't bother.<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52390.<voice 03116_00052390><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03116_00052390><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>No... How could I let this happen...?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52398.<voice 05580_00052398><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 05580_00052398><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Thank you... for stopping Bermud...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52404.<voice 00210_00052404><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00210_00052404><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>It's thanks to you that I

52406.<voice 00280_00052406><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00280_00052406><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Bermud was a famous Monster Master.

52407.<voice 00310_00052407><start_lip_sync n0:

52408.<voice 00360_00052408><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00360_00052408><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Clawde is actually Kalevan,

52409.<voice 00390_00052409><start_lip_sync n0:

52410.<voice 00440_00052410><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00440_00052410><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Surprising, isn't it...?

and humans switch places...?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52411.<voice 00490_00052411><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00490_00052411><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>I'm sure it's because of that war against

52412.<voice 00560_00052412><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00560_00052412><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>When the war broke out, this country's army
sent out Bermud's monsters as their own

52413.<voice 00590_00052413><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00590_00052413><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Kalevan was determined to follow Bermud

52414.<voice 00660_00052414><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00660_00052414><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>I'm not sure what happened after that,
but the next thing I knew I was a human,
and Kalevan was a Great Sabrecat...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74715.<voice 00690_00074715><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00690_00074715><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Monsters we fought became Arahaghiro's
people, and the soldiers we sent to fight

52415.<voice 00705_00052415><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00705_00052415><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Because of that war, all the people in
this country were transformed...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52416.<voice 00740_00052416><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00740_00052416><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>But I want to say just one thing. Bermud
was not a bad person. He was a very
kind man who loved monsters very much.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52417.<voice 00770_00052417><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00770_00052417><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>It was his compassion for monsters-for us...

52418.<voice 00830_00052418><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00830_00052418><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Oh, that's right!

52419.<voice 00860_00052419><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00860_00052419><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>You said you were looking for
butterflies, right?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52420.<voice 01072_00052420><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01072_00052420><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>I was just thinking about this earlier.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52421.<voice 01200_00052421><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01200_00052421><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>These bracelets have a butterfly shape

I thought this might be one of

52422.<voice 01240_00052422><start_lip_sync n0:

52424.<voice 01490_00052424><start_lip_sync n0:

52425.<voice 01510_00052425><start_lip_sync n0:
